function UTILS_StartDragPiece (   Obj,
  Size,
  event 
)

Start drag a piece when click or click and hold button a button over a piece. If click for second time, when click without hold button, then release piece and send move to server. If click and hold button was set and release the button drop piece and send move to server;

References GAME_SendMove(), MainData, OldPos, UTILS_GetMouseCoords(), and UTILS_GetOffset().

Referenced by INTERFACE_NewPiece().
